mutants.original_line: dicv = {i: s.count(i) for i in set(s) if i in vowels}
mutants.mutated_line: dicv = {i: s.count(i) for i in set(s) if i not in vowels}

mutants.original_line: dicc = {i: s.count(i) for i in set(s) if i in consonants}
mutants.mutated_line: dicc = {i: s.count(i) for i in set(s) if i not in consonants}
